text: Karen F. Shepherd (born July 5, 1940 in Silver City, New Mexico) is an American politician of the Democratic Party. She was a member of the United States House of Representatives for Utah from 1993 to 1995. Shepherd studied at the University of Utah and at Brigham Young University. == References == Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from New Mexico Category:United States representatives from Utah Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Karen Shepherd
